snippet.title: Ice Age 2: Arctic Slide JAVA GAME (Glu Mobile 2006 year) FULL WALKTHROUGH
snippet.description:
"Ice Age 2 Arctic Slide" - is the fastest thrill-ride to zip on to your mobile. Play as Scrat, the beloved half squirrel, half rat from Ice Age whose love for acorns gets him into catastrophic trouble. Slide down frosty slopes, coast past icy caves and leap over gaping chasms, seeking the coveted acorn. Overcome treacherous obstacles of the frozen Arctic terrain- bursting geysers, raging snowballs and exploding avalanches!

The aim of the game is to rush through all levels in search of your favorite nuts. Fascinating pictures of global catastrophe, an advancing glacier and slippery snow drifts - all this will sweep past you during a desperate nut race.

Game features:
- The style of passing in the spirit of "roller coaster";
- Great graphics to match the original movie;
- Four different arctic landscapes: snow, caves, glacier and mountains;
- 18 levels packed with adrenaline to the brim.

Chapters in Game:
0:00 - Game Start
0:18 - Instructions
1:20 - Level 1: Slide Away 
2:58 - Level 2: Highs and Lows
4:05 - Level 3: Scratapult
5:42 - Level 4: Don't Cave
8:27 - Level 5: Caved In 
9:45 - Level 6: Rock 'n' Roll
11:40 - Level 7: Final Crash
14:19 - Level 8: Slip 'n' Slide
17:51 - Level 9: The Great Divide
19:29 - Level 10: Super EZ
21:02 - Level 11: Hard Nut to Crack
22:55 - Level 12: S'no Joke
24:50 - Level 13: Winter Wonderland
25:51 - Level 14: Jumpy
26:53- Level 15: Drop Off
29:13 - Level 16: Acorn Isle
30:40 - Level 17: The Big Fall
32:59 - Level 18: Grand Finale
38:59 - Acorn Mission Accomplished! GAME OVER 
39:40 - About Game

DOWNLOAD GAME:
http://dedomil.net/games/1343/screens
https://namobilu.com/java-game/206-ice-age-2-arctic-slide
http://oldfag.top/downloads/?act=view&id=5403
https://sefan.ru/loads/my.php?id=11689&style=2&lan=en&page=0&l=games%2F176x220%2FJava%2Ficeage2_220.jar
http://funbary.net/java/arkad/717-ice_age_2_arctic_slide.html
